mods.abstract: Typed Hatch order file documenting the Heritage Poster/ Bill Denny's order of 100 2-color window cards advertising the Grand Ole Opry star Hank Williams at Dover High School on May 12.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
